info.title: API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for the Fastify server

post.description: Creates a new clip with the provided information and returns presigned URLs for upload

get.description: Retrieves clips with optional filtering and pagination

get.summary: Get clip by ID or slug
get.description: Retrieves a specific clip by its ID or slug
Retrieves a specific clip by its slug

put.description: Updates a clip with the provided information. Only the author can update a clip.

delete.description: Deletes a clip. Only the author can delete a clip.

get.description: Returns the health status of the API server

post.summary: Create a new API key for current user
post.description: Creates a new API key for the authenticated user. Temporary endpoint for lyell users.
Creates a new API key. Requires admin privileges.
Submits a prompt directly to the stream for immediate processing

post.summary: Submit prompt directly to public stream
post.description: Submits a prompt directly to the public stream for immediate processing
Adds a prompt to the processing queue for the specified stream

get.description: Retrieves the current prompt and recent prompts for the specified stream

put.description: Adds a randomly selected prompt to the processing queue for the specified stream

post.summary: Submit StreamDiffusion prompt with advanced parameters
post.description: Submits a StreamDiffusion prompt with advanced parameters including controlnets, lora settings, and other configurations for TouchDesigner integration. Validation warnings will be returned instead of errors for invalid parameters.

post.summary: Submit StreamDiffusion prompt with advanced parameters to public stream
post.description: Submits a StreamDiffusion prompt with advanced parameters including controlnets, lora settings, and other configurations for TouchDesigner integration
Creates a new video processing stream with the specified configuration

get.description: Retrieves all streams belonging to the authenticated user

delete.description: Deletes a specific stream by ID for the authenticated user

post.description: Creates a new video processing stream with the specified configuration

get.description: Retrieves the main stream for the authenticated user, creating it if it doesn't exist
